channel.title: [317] Frozn Tyme V2 Development Team [PI] [New Pics]
channel.description:
Hello, it's me, 3lv3n Snip3r and I bring a new server to you that I have been coding for only a little time now. My first release was a Delta, but I've moved on from Delta to Project Insanity.
___________________________________________________________
Source: Project Insanity. Client: Galkons Refactored.
___________________________________________________________
[u]What I hope to accomplish: [/u] Add 562 Gameframe with minimap orbs. Add 508 Maps. Add 634 Items. Add 602 Npc's. Add 602 Anim's and Gfx's. Add full Curse Prayers. Add Tormented Demons. Add Corporeal Beast. Add Slayer Point Shop. Add Skill Cape Emotes. Add Lunar Magic, because this source does not have it.
___________________________________________________________
[size=14pt][u]Some pictures:[/u][/size]
Loading Bar. [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/FTV2loadingbar.jpg[/img]
Login Screen. [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/FTV2login.jpg[/img]
Home. [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/Ftv2home.jpg[/img]
Bank. [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv2bank.jpg[/img]
Stats Interface. [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv2statinterface.jpg[/img]
Equipment Tab. [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv2equipment.jpg[/img]
Prayer Tab. [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv2prayers.jpg[/img] [s]Turmoil works fully but there is no animation/gfx.[/s] **EDIT** Turmoil now has animation and gfx!
Updated Client/Server! [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv2updatedclient1-1.jpg[/img]
Dragon Claw special and Chaotic Maul attack [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv22dclawcmaulattack.jpg[/img] Head-Admin Liam helped.
562 Gameframe! added 100% by me (Matthew) [IMG]http://i1214.photobucket.com/albums/cc492/3lv3nsnip3r/ftv2562gameframe.jpg[/img]
___________________________________________________________
[size=12pt][u]Application:[/u][/size]
[code]Name: Email Address: What time zone are you in?: Position picked: How long you have been into RSPS's?: How long you have coded (If picked Server/Client/Website Coder)?: How long will it be on a day (If picked Hoster)?: How long are you on a day?: Why do you want the position you picked?: [/code]
**We only need a hoster until we get a VPS.**
___________________________________________________________
Hoster: 1/1 (pokemonn) Server Coders: 2/2 (Me, pokemonn) Client Coders: 0/2 Website Coders: 1/2 (Aetoc) Testers: 3/4 (jedimatt84, DraconicDS, jonee140) Admins: 1/2 (liamp) Mods: 0/3

@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

We are still currently looking for a client coder if anyone is interested! Please pm me or register on our forums.

item.title: [317] Frozn Tyme V2 Development Team [PI] [New Pics]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“jonee140, post:29, topic:398990”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=496128.msg3630355#msg3630355 date=1308167420]

Name:jon
Email Address:jon.ledoux@yahoo.com
What time zone are you in?: moutain time
Position picked:admin or tester
How long you have been into RSPS’s?: over 3 years
How long you have coded (If picked Server/Client/Website Coder)?:
How long will it be on a day (If picked Hoster)?:
How long are you on a day?:mostly all day long
Why do you want the position you picked?:because i am a loyal admin i handle situations very well and i settle argument quickly

Accepted.

quick question may i be a admin also

the people after me got accepted as testers only i talked to owner and as im co-owner and coder and hoster im going to have to say no jonee to many staff = players dont like

pokemonn is right jonee140, you will still be tester though.

what do u mean ppl wont like me as staff

No one said that, its just that we dont want a lot of staff until we get a lot of people, you will still be a tester though.
[/quote]
when i asked u if i can be admin u clearly said and i quote"get on the server first." meaning when i get on server i will be.[/quote]

You haven’t gotten on though.

Read full topic
